With increased risk cardiovascular life-threatening disease obesity , promotion healthful habit important . Providing motivational skill adhere habit also crucial , especially people overweight depress . This study compare effectiveness two weight loss program , one supplement health education supplement behavioral counseling , treat woman depress overweight . Participants 2-year study divide one two treatment group : one group address weight loss depression via nutrition , exercise , health education group address weight loss depression via nutrition , exercise , behavioral counseling .
